mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM service_repair_manage WHERE model_name = #{model_name} AND serial_no = #{serial_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `service_repair_manage` (MATERIAL_ID, MODEL_NAME, SERIAL_NO, SORC_NO, KIND, SERVICE_REPAIR_FLG, RC_MAILSEND_DATE, RC_SHIP_ASSIGN_DATE, QA_RECEPTION_TIME, QA_REFEREE_TIME, ANSWER_IN_DEADLINE, SERVICE_FREE_FLG, QA_SECONDARY_REFEREE_DATE, RANK, WORKSHOP, COUNTERMEASURES, actual_fault, COMMENT, MENTION) VALUES (#{material_id}, #{model_name}, #{serial_no}, #{sorc_no}, #{kind}, #{service_repair_flg}, #{rc_mailsend_date}, #{rc_ship_assign_date}, #{qa_reception_time}, #{qa_referee_time}, #{answer_in_deadline}, #{service_free_flg}, #{qa_secondary_referee_date}, #{rank}, #{workshop}, #{countermeasures}, #{actual_fault}, #{comment}, #{mention});

INSERT INTO `service_repair_past_material` (MODEL_NAME, SERIAL_NO, RC_MAILSEND_DATE, RECEPTION_DATE, QUOTATION_DATE, AGREED_DATE, INLINE_DATE, OUTLINE_DATE) VALUES (#{model_name}, #{serial_no}, #{rc_mailsend_date}, #{reception_date}, #{quotation_date}, #{agreed_date}, #{inline_date}, #{outline_date});
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(MIN(qa_reception_time),CURDATE()) AS qa_reception_time FROM service_repair_manage WHERE qa_referee_time is NULL

SELECT srm.material_id, srm.countermeasures, srm.service_free_flg, srm.serial_no FROM service_repair_manage srm JOIN material m ON srm.material_id = m.material_id WHERE (m.serial_no, m.reception_time) IN ( SELECT serial_no, reception_time FROM material WHERE material_id = #{material_id} ) AND srm.countermeasures IS NOT NULL

SELECT sra.usage_frequency, srm.material_id, srm.model_name, srm.serial_no, COALESCE(ma.omr_notifi_no, srm.sorc_no, ma.sorc_no) AS sorc_no, srm.service_repair_flg, srm.rc_mailsend_date, srm.rc_ship_assign_date, COALESCE(ma.reception_time, srpm.reception_date) AS reception_date, srm.qa_reception_time, srm.qa_referee_time, srm.answer_in_deadline, srm.qa_secondary_referee_date, srm.rank, srm.service_free_flg, srm.workshop, srm.countermeasures, srm.actual_fault, COALESCE(pr.finish_time, srpm.quotation_date) AS quotation_date, COALESCE(ma.agreed_date, srpm.agreed_date) AS agreed_date, COALESCE(ma.inline_time, srpm.inline_date) AS inline_date, COALESCE(ma.outline_time, srpm.outline_date) AS outline_date, (ma.break_back_flg = 2) AS unfix_back_flg, srm.`comment`, srm.mention, srm.quality_judgment, srm.qis_isuse, qis.quality_info_no, qis.qis_invoice_no, qis.qis_invoice_date, qis.include_month, qis.charge_amount, sra.model_name, sra.serial_no, sra.rc_mailsend_date, sra.analysis_no, sra.customer_id, sra.customer_name, sra.analysis_result, sra.fix_demand, sra.trouble_discribe, sra.trouble_cause, sra.liability_flg, sra.manufactory_flg, sra.append_component, sra.quantity, sra.loss_amount, sra.last_sorc_no, sra.last_shipping_date, sra.last_rank, sra.last_trouble_feature, sra.wash_feature, sra.disinfect_feature, sra.steriliza_feature, sra.usage_frequency, sra.analysis_correspond_suggestion, sra.corresponse_flg, sra.entity_send_flg, sra.trouble_item_reception_date, sra.trouble_item_in_bussiness_date, sra.trouble_item_out_bussiness_date, sra.qis2_date, sra.qis3_date, sra.waste_certificated_date, srm.kind, sra.m_trouble_phenomenon_confirm, sra.m_judgment_result, sra.m_analysis_result_brief, sra.m_correspond_method, sra.m_solutions, srm.etq_no, srm.pae_no, sra.setup_date, sra.trouble_happen_date, sra.use_count, sra.use_elapse FROM service_repair_manage srm LEFT JOIN service_repair_past_material srpm ON srm.model_name = srpm.model_name AND srm.serial_no = srpm.serial_no AND srm.rc_mailsend_date = srpm.rc_mailsend_date LEFT JOIN production_feature pr ON srm.material_id = pr.material_id AND pr.position_id in (select position_id from position where special_page = 'quotation') and pr.position_id != 101 AND pr.operate_result = 2 LEFT JOIN qis_payout qis ON srm.model_name = qis.model_name AND srm.serial_no = qis.serial_no AND srm.rc_mailsend_date = qis.rc_mailsend_date LEFT JOIN material ma ON srm.material_id = ma.material_id LEFT JOIN service_repair_analysis sra ON sra.model_name = srm.model_name AND sra.serial_no = srm.serial_no AND sra.rc_mailsend_date = srm.rc_mailsend_date
srm.model_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{model_name},'%')
AND srm.serial_no=#{serial_no}
AND (ma.sorc_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sorc_no},'%') OR srm.sorc_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sorc_no},'%') or ma.omr_notifi_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{sorc_no},'%'))
AND srm.rc_mailsend_date = #{rc_mailsend_date}
AND srm.service_repair_flg=#{service_repair_flg}
AND (srm.qa_reception_time>=#{qa_reception_time_start} OR srm.qa_reception_time IS NULL)
AND DATE(srm.qa_reception_time)<=DATE(#{qa_reception_time_end})
AND DATE(srm.qa_referee_time)>=#{qa_referee_time_start}
AND DATE(srm.qa_referee_time)<=DATE(#{qa_referee_time_end})
AND srm.answer_in_deadline=2
AND (srm.answer_in_deadline=1 or srm.answer_in_deadline=2)
AND srm.answer_in_deadline=0
AND srm.service_free_flg=#{service_free_flg}
AND ma.break_back_flg = 2
AND ma.break_back_flg = 0
AND srm.material_id=#{material_id}
AND sra.entity_send_flg LIKE CONCAT('1','%')
AND sra.entity_send_flg LIKE CONCAT('2','%')
AND qis.quality_info_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{quality_info_no},'%')
AND qis.qis_invoice_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qis_invoice_no},'%')
AND srm.kind = #{kind}
AND srm.etq_no LIKE CONCAT('%',#{etq_no},'%')
ORDER BY srm.rc_mailsend_date,srm.qa_reception_time,srm.qa_referee_time
SELECT DISTINCT rank FROM service_repair_manage WHERE rank is not null

SELECT ma.material_id, ma.omr_notifi_no as sorc_no, ma.reception_time, ma.break_back_flg, ma.service_repair_flg, ma.outline_time FROM material ma LEFT JOIN model mo ON ma.model_id=mo.model_id WHERE mo.name=#{model_name} AND ma.serial_no=#{serial_no} AND (ma.break_back_flg = 0 OR ma.inline_time IS NOT null) ORDER BY outline_time is null, outline_time ;
mapper.update:
UPDATE service_repair_manage SET kind = #{kind}, service_repair_flg=#{service_repair_flg}, rank = #{rank}, service_free_flg=#{service_free_flg}, workshop=#{workshop},
qa_secondary_referee_date=current_date(),
etq_no = #{etq_no}, pae_no = #{pae_no}, countermeasures=#{countermeasures},
actual_fault=#{actual_fault},
comment=#{comment}, quality_judgment=#{quality_judgment}, qis_isuse=#{qis_isuse} WHERE model_name=#{model_name} AND serial_no=#{serial_no} AND rc_mailsend_date=#{rc_mailsend_date}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM qis_payout WHERE model_name=#{model_name} AND serial_no=#{serial_no} AND rc_mailsend_date=#{rc_mailsend_date}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO qis_payout (model_name, serial_no, rc_mailsend_date, quality_info_no, qis_invoice_no, qis_invoice_date, include_month, charge_amount) VALUES (#{model_name}, #{serial_no}, #{rc_mailsend_date}, #{quality_info_no}, #{qis_invoice_no}, #{qis_invoice_date}, #{include_month}, #{charge_amount})
mapper.select: SELECT MAX(material_id) FROM service_repair_manage WHERE material_id like CONCAT(#{type},'%');
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM service_repair_manage WHERE model_name=#{model_name} AND serial_no=#{serial_no} AND rc_mailsend_date=#{rc_mailsend_date}
mapper.select: SELECT rc_mailsend_date FROM service_repair_analysis WHERE model_name=#{model_name} AND serial_no=#{serial_no} AND rc_mailsend_date=#{rc_mailsend_date}
